Uses of Class
suncertify.client.BrokerClientException

  • Packages that use BrokerClientException 
    Package Description
    suncertify.client  
    suncertify.client.gui  

    • Uses of BrokerClientException in suncertify.client

      Methods in suncertify.client that throw BrokerClientException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BrokerClient BrokerClient.getClient(AppRunMode runMode)
      This method returns a reference to a BrokerClient object depending on the runMode parameter.
      static ClientController ClientController.getController(AppRunMode mode)
      This method provides the mechanism for the creation of Controller objects.
      void BrokerRemoteClient.startClient()
      This method executes the remote client startup process.
      void BrokerLocalClient.startClient()
      This method executes the startup process for the local client.
      void BrokerClient.startClient()
      This method creates an instance of a ClientCleanupThread object and registers it with the JVM.
      void BrokerRemoteClient.stopClient()
      This method executes the remote client termination process if the client startup was previously done successfully.
      void BrokerLocalClient.stopClient()
      This method executes the client shutdown process if the client startup was previously done successfully.
      abstract void BrokerClient.stopClient()
      This method implements the client shutdown process.
      void RemoteClientController.stopController()
      This method performs performs the shutdown process for the controller.
      void ClientController.stopController()
      The call to this method will result in the controller unregistering itself for DB updates from the DB server.
      Constructors in suncertify.client that throw BrokerClientException 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalClientController()
      The constructor.
      RemoteClientController()
      The constructor.

      This is the constructor for the application main GUI.
